column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////excellent steak house food and ambiance.  started with bone marrow (giant pieces) with a perfect red onion jam and parsley on the bread
column2: like a liquidy foie. also had smoked salmon caesar.  shared Prime Bone In Dry Aged Ribeye -- pretty much done to perfection with easy to slice pieces
column5: fatty savory inside.  3 people can share two steaks
column6: as we also had the prime filet bone in as well
column7: which was not fatty but went well with the salt and bernaise sauce.  ribeye is the better cut.  elote corn side only problem was the corn not crisp kernels.  butternut squash grilled with bourbon
column8: sage was excellent.  definitely come here
